This folder contains two hidden folders named .acquia and .drush. Both of these folders should be placed in the $HOME directory on your system. The .acquia folder contains your Cloud Platform API credentials and the .drush folder contains your Drush aliases for the sites you currently have access to on the Cloud Platform.

Refer to "About Drush on the Cloud Platform" (https://docs.acquia.com/acquia-cloud/manage/ssh/drush/) for more information."
